remarks.format:
## Remarks 类将 XML 数据写入流、 文件、 文本读取器或字符串。The class writes XML data to a stream, file, text reader, or string. 它支持 W3C[可扩展标记语言 (XML) 1.0 （第四个版本）](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)和[在 XML 1.0 中的命名空间 （第三版）](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)建议。It supports the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) and [Namespaces in XML 1.0 (third edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendations. 成员类使您能够：The members of the class enable you to: - 检查字符是不是合法的 XML 字符，元素和属性的名称是不是有效的 XML 名称。Verify that the characters are legal XML characters and that element and attribute names are valid XML names. - 检查 XML 文档的格式是否正确。Verify that the XML document is well-formed. - 将二进制字节编码为 Base64 或 BinHex，并将写出结果文本。Encode binary bytes as Base64 or BinHex, and write out the resulting text. - 将值传递通过使用公共语言运行时类型而不字符串，为了避免必须手动执行值的转换。Pass values by using common language runtime types instead of strings, to avoid having to manually perform value conversions. - 将多个文档写入一个输出流。Write multiple documents to one output stream. - 写出有效的名称、限定名和名称标记。Write valid names, qualified names, and name tokens. 本节内容：In this section: [创建 XML 编写器](#create) [Creating an XML writer](#create) [指定的输出格式](#output) [Specifying the output format](#output) [数据一致性](#conformance) [Data conformance](#conformance) [写入元素](#writing_elements) [Writing elements](#writing_elements) [编写特性](#writing_attributes) [Writing attributes](#writing_attributes) [处理命名空间](#handling_ns) [Handling namespaces](#handling_ns) [写出类型化数据](#writing_types) [Writing typed data](#writing_types) [关闭的 XML 编写器](#close) [Closing the XML writer](#close) [异步编程](#async) [Asynchronous programming](#async) [安全注意事项Security considerations](#security) ## 创建 XML 编写器Creating an XML writer 若要创建实例，请使用方法。To create an instance, use the method. 若要指定你想要启用对 XML 编写器的功能集，将传递到方法。To specify the set of features you want to enable on the XML writer, pass an to the method. 否则，将使用默认设置。Otherwise, default settings are used. 请参阅引用有关详细信息的页面。See the reference pages for details. ## 指定的输出格式Specifying the output format 类包括几个属性用于控制如何输出格式：The class includes several properties that control how output is formatted: |属性Property|描述Description| |--------------|-----------------| ||指定要使用的文本编码。Specifies the text encoding to use. 默认值为 `Encoding.UTF8`。The default is `Encoding.UTF8`.| ||指示是否使元素缩进。Indicates whether to indent elements. 默认值是`false`（没有缩进）。The default is `false` (no indentation).| ||指定在缩进时要使用的字符串。Specifies the character string to use when indenting. 默认值为两个空格。The default is two spaces.| ||指定分行符要使用的字符串。Specifies the character string to use for line breaks. 默认值为 `\r\n`（回车符、换行符）。The default is `\r\n` (carriage return, line feed).| ||指定如何处理换行符。Specifies how to handle newline characters.| ||指示是否在新行上编写属性。Indicates whether to write attributes on a new line. 在使用此属性时， 应设置为 `true`。 should be set to `true` when using this property. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.| ||指示是否编写 XML 声明。Indicates whether to write an XML declaration. 默认值为 `false`。The default is `false`.| 和 属性控制无效空白如何格式化。The and properties control how insignificant white space is formatted. 例如，若要缩进元素节点：For example, to indent element nodes: [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#8)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#8)] 使用在具有个额外级别的缩进新行上写入每个属性：Use the to write each attribute on a new line with one extra level of indentation: [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#9)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#9)] ## 数据一致性Data conformance XML 编写器使用从两个属性类的数据一致性检查：An XML writer uses two properties from the class to check for data conformance: - 属性指示要检查字符和引发的 XML 编写器如果任何字符都是在合法范围，如由 W3C 定义的异常。The property instructs the XML writer to check characters and throw an exception if any characters are outside the legal range, as defined by the W3C. - 属性配置要检查正在写入的流符合格式正确的 XML 1.0 文档或文档片段的规则定义 w3c 的 XML 编写器。The property configures the XML writer to check that the stream being written complies with the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document or document fragment, as defined by the W3C. 下表中介绍了这些三个一致性级别。The three conformance levels are described in the following table. 默认值为 。The default is . 有关详细信息，请参阅属性和枚举。For details, see the property and the enumeration. |级别Level|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||XML 输出符合格式正确的 XML 1.0 文档的规则，并可由任何兼容的处理器的处理。The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document and can be processed by any conforming processor.| ||XML 输出符合格式正确的 XML 1.0 文档片段的规则。The XML output conforms to the rules for a well-formed XML 1.0 document fragment.| ||XML 编写器确定确认检查要应用 （文档或片段） 基于传入数据的级别。The XML writer determines which level of conformation checking to apply (document or fragment) based on the incoming data.| ## 写入元素Writing elements 你可以使用以下方法来写入元素节点。You can use the following methods to write element nodes. 有关示例，请参阅列出的方法。For examples, see the methods listed. |使用Use|到To| |---------|--------| ||编写整个元素节点，包括一个字符串值。Write an entire element node, including a string value.| ||若要通过使用多个方法调用中编写元素值。To write an element value by using multiple method calls. 例如，可以调用 来编写类型化的值，调用 来编写字符实体，调用 来编写属性，也可以编写子元素。For example, you can call to write a typed value, to write a character entity, to write an attribute, or you can write a child element. 这是更复杂的版本方法。This is a more sophisticated version of the method.

若要关闭元素，则调用或方法。To close the element, you call the or method.| ||要复制的当前的位置处的元素节点或对象。To copy an element node found at the current position of an or object. 在调用时，会将源对象中的所有内容复制到 实例。When called, it copies everything from the source object to the instance.| ## 编写特性Writing attributes 你可以使用以下方法在元素节点上写入属性。You can use the following methods to write attributes on element nodes. 这些方法还可用于在元素上，创建命名空间声明中的下一节所述。These methods can also be used to create namespace declarations on an element, as discussed in the next section. |使用Use|到To| |---------|--------| ||若要编写整个属性节点上，包括一个字符串值。To write an entire attribute node, including a string value.| ||若要编写使用多个方法调用的属性值。To write the attribute value using multiple method calls. 例如，你可以调用编写类型化的值。For example, you can call to write a typed value. 这是更复杂的版本方法。This is a more sophisticated version of the method.

若要关闭元素，则调用方法。To close the element, you call the method.| ||若要将在当前的位置找到的所有属性都复制对象。To copy all the attributes found at the current position of an object. 写入的属性取决于读取器当前所处的节点的类型：The attributes that are written depend on the type of node the reader is currently positioned on:

-对于属性节点上，它写入当前的属性中，，然后选择属性的其余部分直到元素结束标记。- For an attribute node, it writes the current attribute, and then the rest of the attributes until the element closing tag.
-对于元素节点，则它写入所有属性包含的元素。- For an element node, it writes all attributes contained by the element.
-对于 XML 声明节点，它在声明中写入所有属性。- For an XML declaration node, it writes all the attributes in the declaration.
-对于所有其他节点类型，该方法将引发异常。- For all other node types, the method throws an exception.| ## 处理命名空间Handling namespaces 命名空间用于限定 XML 文档中的元素和属性的名称。Namespaces are used to qualify element and attribute names in an XML document. Namespace 前缀将元素和属性与 URI 引用与反过来关联的命名空间相关联。Namespace prefixes associate elements and attributes with namespaces, which are in turn associated with URI references. 命名空间在 XML 文档中实现元素和属性名称的唯一性。Namespaces create element and attribute name uniqueness in an XML document. 维护对应于在当前命名空间范围内定义的所有命名空间的命名空间堆栈。The maintains a namespace stack that corresponds to all the namespaces defined in the current namespace scope. 在编写元素和属性时，可以通过下列方式利用命名空间：When writing elements and attributes you can utilize namespaces in the following ways: - 通过使用手动声明命名空间方法。Declare namespaces manually by using the method. 如果知道如何最大程度地优化命名空间声明的数目，可以使用此方法。This can be useful when you know how to best optimize the number of namespace declarations. 有关示例，请参阅方法。For an example, see the method. - 用新的命名空间重写当前命名空间声明。Override the current namespace declaration with a new namespace. 在下面的代码中，方法更改命名空间 URI 为`"x"`从前缀`"123"`到`"abc"`。In the following code, the method changes the namespace URI for the `"x"` prefix from `"123"` to `"abc"`. [!code-csharp[XmlWriter_v2#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/CS/writer_v2.cs#18)] [!code-vb[XmlWriter_v2#18](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlWriter_v2/VB/writer_v2.vb#18)] 代码生成以下 XML 字符串：The code generates the following XML string: ```xml ``` - 在编写属性或元素时指定命名空间前缀。Specify a namespace prefix when writing attributes or elements. 很多用于写入元素和属性的方法，可以执行此操作。Many of the methods used to write element and attributes enable you to do this. 例如，方法写入的开始标记并将其与指定的命名空间和前缀关联起来。For example, the method writes a start tag and associates it with a specified namespace and prefix. ## 写出类型化数据Writing typed data 方法接受一个公共语言运行时 (CLR) 对象，将输入的值转换为其字符串表示形式根据 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 数据类型转换规则，并将其签出通过使用方法。The method accepts a common language runtime (CLR) object, converts the input value to its string representation according to XML schema definition language (XSD) data type conversion rules, and writes it out by using the method. 这是比使用中的方法更容易类来写出之前将类型化的数据转换为字符串值。This is easier than using the methods in the class to convert the typed data to a string value before writing it out. 写入到文本时，类型化的值序列化为文本使用该架构类型规则。When writing to text, the typed value is serialized to text by using the rules for that schema type. 对应于 CLR 类型的默认 XSD 数据类型，请参阅方法。For default XSD data types that correspond to CLR types, see the method. 还可用于写入到 XML 数据存储区。The can also be used to write to an XML data store. 例如， 类可以创建一个 对象，用于为 对象创建节点。For example, the class can create an object to create nodes for an object. 如果数据存储区具有架构信息供，方法引发异常，如果你尝试将转换为不允许的类型。如果数据存储没有架构信息供，方法将所有值视为`xsd:anySimpleType`类型。If the data store has schema information available to it, the method throws an exception if you try to convert to a type that is not allowed.If the data store does not have schema information available to it, the method treats all values as an `xsd:anySimpleType` type. ## 关闭的 XML 编写器Closing the XML writer 当你使用输出 XML、 元素和属性的方法不会写入直到你调用方法。When you use methods to output XML, the elements and attributes are not written until you call the method. 例如，如果你使用来填充对象，你将无法查看的写入的元素和目标文档中的属性，直到您关闭实例。For example, if you are using to populate an object, you won't be able to see the written elements and attributes in the target document until you close the instance. ## 异步编程Asynchronous programming 大部分方法都具有有它们的方法名称末尾的"Async"的异步对应项。Most of the methods have asynchronous counterparts that have "Async" at the end of their method names. 例如，异步等效于是。For example, the asynchronous equivalent of is . 有关方法，它不具有异步等效，返回的值转换为字符串并使用方法相反。For the method, which doesn't have an asynchronous counterpart, convert the return value to a string and use the method instead. ## 安全注意事项Security considerations 使用时，请考虑以下类：Consider the following when working with the class: - 引发的异常可能会泄露冒泡到该应用程序不希望的路径信息。Exceptions thrown by the can disclose path information that you do not want bubbled up to the app. 你的应用必须捕获异常并进行相应的处理。Your app must catch exceptions and process them appropriately. - 不会验证传递给任何数据或方法。 does not validate any data that is passed to the or method. 你不应将任意数据传递给这些方法。You should not pass arbitrary data to these methods. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用异步 API 来生成 XML。The following example code shows how to use the asynchronous API to generate XML. ```csharp async Task TestWriter(Stream stream) { XmlWriterSettings settings = new XmlWriterSettings(); settings.Async = true; using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(stream, settings)) { await writer.WriteStartElementAsync("pf", "root", "http://ns"); await writer.WriteStartElementAsync(null, "sub", null); await writer.WriteAttributeStringAsync(null, "att", null, "val"); await writer.WriteStringAsync("text"); await writer.WriteEndElementAsync(); await writer.WriteProcessingInstructionAsync("pName", "pValue"); await writer.WriteCommentAsync("cValue"); await writer.WriteCDataAsync("cdata value"); await writer.WriteEndElementAsync(); await writer.FlushAsync(); } } ```
